mapper.select: SELECT sk.seckill_id, sk.user_phone, sk.state, sk.create_time, s.seckill_id "seckill.seckill_id", s.name "seckill.name", s.number "seckill.number", s.start_time "seckill.start_time", s.end_time "seckill.end_time", s.create_time "seckill.create_time" FROM success_killed sk inner join seckill s on sk.seckill_id=s.seckill_id where sk.seckill_id=#{seckillId} AND sk.user_phone=#{userPhone}
